document.full_text: a mock google product announced on april fool's day promised to let users control gmail with their body. but a group of university students and hackers figured out how to really do it, using a hacked version of microsoft's kinect.
document.title: gmail april fool's joke turned into a reality
lines_and_colors: a mock google product announced on april fool's day promised to let users control gmail with their body. but a group of university students and hackers figured out how to really do it, using a hacked version of microsoft's kinect.
